page.title: 06PUBLIC HOUSE OF 1985
page.content: In our survey area there are 9 public houses.One of the public houses is called The Fighting Cocks.The Fighting Cocks has been open seven years.It is open nine hours a day.On average Â£300 a day is taken over the counter and 400 pints are drunk each day and night.At the pub there are nine employees three cleaners one catering and five barstaff.At the pub they sell all sorts of food.Sunday is the busiest day for the pub.In the pub 9 to 11 o,clock in the evenings is the busiest time of the day.In the evenings they have pool,football and dart tournaments against other clubs. The pubs play an important part in the local community.Some pubs organize events for children and provide games. On special occasions the pubs stay open later than normal. By Garry Moore ,Ingrid Wilson,Ruth Francis.
